question: Lord Hastings appointed the Munsifs in every Thana to perform which of the following duties?
option1: To solve cases bearing the value up to Rs. 64
option2: To solve cases bearing the value up to Rs. 500
option3: To maintain strict law and order
option4: To review the judgement of the prisoners
answer: To solve cases bearing the value up to Rs. 64
explanation: Lord Hastings appointed the Munsifs in every Thana to solve cases bearing the value up to Rs. 64. The judges of the Diwani Adalat used to appoint the Munsifs.
